014package org.microbean.qualifier;
015
016import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
017import java.lang.constant.Constable;
018import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
022
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.Map.Entry;
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.SortedMap;
029import java.util.TreeMap;
030
031import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
032
033import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
034import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
035import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
036import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_String;
037import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
038
039import static java.util.Collections.emptySortedMap;
040import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedMap;
041
042import static org.microbean.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Comparable;
043
044/**
045 * An abstract {@linkplain #attributes() attributed} {@linkplain #name() name}-{@linkplain #value() value} pair.
046 *
047 * @param <V> the type of a {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain #value() value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute
048 * values}
049 *
050 * @param <B> the type of the subclass
051 *
052 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
053 */
054public abstract class Binding<V, B extends Binding<V, B>> implements Comparable<B>, Constable {
055
056
057  /*
058   * Instance fields.
059   */
060
061
062  private final String name;
063
064  private final V value;
065
066  private final SortedMap<String, Object> attributes;
067
068  private final SortedMap<String, Object> info;
069
070
071  /*
072   * Constructors.
073   */
074
075
076  /**
077   * Creates a new {@link Binding}.
078   *
079   * @param name the name; must not be {@code null}
080   *
081   * @param value the value; may be {@code null}
082   *
083   * @param attributes further describing this {@link Binding}; may be {@code null}
084   *
085   * @param info informational attributes further describing this {@link Binding} that are not considered by its {@link
086   * #equals(Object)} implementation; may be {@code null}
087   *
088   * @see #name()
089   *
090   * @see #value()
091   *
092   * @see #attributes()
093   *
094   * @see #info()
095   */
096  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
097  protected Binding(final String name,
098                    final V value,
099                    final Map<? extends String, ?> attributes,
100                    final Map<? extends String, ?> info) {
101    super();
102    this.name = Objects.requireNonNull(name);
103    this.value = value;
104    this.attributes =
105      attributes == null || attributes.isEmpty() ? emptySortedMap() : unmodifiableSortedMap(new TreeMap<>(attributes));
106    if (info == null || info.isEmpty()) {
107      this.info = emptySortedMap();
108    } else {
109      final TreeMap<String, Object> map = new TreeMap<>();
110      for (final String key : info.keySet()) {
111        if (!this.attributes.containsKey(key)) {
112          map.put(key, info.get(key));
113        }
114      }
115      this.info = unmodifiableSortedMap(map);
116    }
117  }
118
119
120  /*
121   * Instance methods.
122   */
123
124
125  /**
126   * Returns the name of this {@link Binding}.
127   *
128   * @return the name of this {@link Binding}
129   *
130   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
131   *
132   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
133   *
134   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
135   */
136  public final String name() {
137    return this.name;
138  }
139
140  /**
141   * Returns the value of this {@link Binding}, which may be {@code null}.
142   *
143   * @return the value of this {@link Binding}
144   *
145   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
146   *
147   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
148   *
149   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
150   */
151  public final V value() {
152    return this.value;
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Returns an immutable {@link SortedMap} representing any attributes further describing this {@link Binding}.
157   *
158   * <p>The attributes are considered by the {@link #equals(Object)} method.</p>
159   *
160   * @return the attributes of this {@link Binding}
161   *
162   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
163   *
164   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
165   *
166   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
167   */
168  public final SortedMap<String, Object> attributes() {
169    return this.attributes;
170  }
171
172  /**
173   * Returns an immutable {@link SortedMap} representing any informational-only attributes further describing this
174   * {@link Binding}.
175   *
176   * <p>The attributes are not considered by the {@link #equals(Object)} method.</p>
177   *
178   * @return the informational attributes of this {@link Binding}
179   *
180   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
181   *
182   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
183   *
184   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
185   */
186  public final SortedMap<String, Object> info() {
187    return this.info;
188  }
189
190  /**
191   * Returns an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc} describing this {@link Binding}, if this {@link Binding}
192   * is capable of being represented as a <a
193   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
194   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if not.
195   *
196   * @return an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc} describing this {@link Binding}, if this {@link Binding}
197   * is capable of being represented as a <a
198   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
199   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link Optional} if not
200   *
201   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
202   *
203   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
204   *
205   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
206   *
207   * @see #describeConstructor()
208   *
209   * @see <a
210   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">Dynamically-computed
211   * constants</a>
212   */
213  @Override // Constable
214  public Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
215    final MethodHandleDesc constructor = this.describeConstructor();
216    if (constructor == null) {
217      return Optional.empty();
218    }
219    final V value = this.value();
220    final ConstantDesc valueCd;
221    if (value == null) {
222      valueCd = NULL;
223    } else if (value instanceof Constable c) {
224      valueCd = c.describeConstable().orElse(null);
225    } else if (value instanceof ConstantDesc cd) {
226      valueCd = cd;
227    } else {
228      return Optional.empty();
229    }
230    final ConstantDesc attributesCd = Constables.describeConstable(this.attributes()).orElse(null);
231    if (attributesCd == null) {
232      return Optional.empty();
233    }
234    final ConstantDesc infoCd = Constables.describeConstable(this.info()).orElse(null);
235    if (infoCd == null) {
236      return Optional.empty();
237    }
238    return
239      Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, constructor, this.name(), valueCd, attributesCd, infoCd));
240  }
241
242  /**
243   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or {@code static} method that will be used to create
244   * a <a
245   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
246   * constant</a> representing this {@link Binding}.
247   *
248   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or {@code static} method that will be used to create
249   * a <a
250   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
251   * constant</a> representing this {@link Binding}
252   *
253   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not, return {@code null}.
254   *
255   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be, idempotent and deterministic.
256   *
257   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
258   */
259  protected MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
260    return
261      MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(this.getClass().describeConstable().orElseThrow(),
262                                     new ClassDesc[] { CD_String, CD_Object, CD_Map, CD_Map });
263  }
264
265  /**
266   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Binding} that represents its {@linkplain #name() name}, {@linkplain #value()
267   * value} and {@linkplain #attributes() attributes}.
268   *
269   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the {@link #equals(Object)} and {@link
270   * #compareTo(Binding)} methods accordingly.</p>
271   *
272   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Binding}
273   *
274   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be, idempotent and deterministic.
275   *
276   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
277   *
278   * @see #equals(Object)
279   *
280   * @see #compareTo(Binding)
281   */
282  @Override // Object
283  public int hashCode() {
284    int hashCode = 17;
285
286    Object v = this.name();
287    int c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
288    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
289
290    v = this.value();
291    c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
292    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
293
294    v = this.attributes();
295    c = v == null ? 0 : v.hashCode();
296    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + c;
297
298    return hashCode;
299  }
300
301  /**
302   * Returns an {@code int} representing a {@linkplain Comparable#compareTo(Object) comparison} of this {@link Binding}
303   * with the supplied {@link Binding}, by considering the {@linkplain #name() names}, {@linkplain #value() values} and
304   * {@linkplain #attributes() attributes} of both {@link Binding}s.
305   *
306   * <p>Any {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values} that are not {@link Comparable} instances will be compared based
307   * on their {@linkplain Object#toString() string representations}.  It is strongly recommended that {@linkplain
308   * #attributes() attribute values} implement {@link Comparable}.</p>
309   *
310   * <p>This method is, and its overrides must be, {@linkplain Comparable consistent with equals}.</p>
311   *
312   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the {@link #hashCode()} and {@link #equals(Object)}
313   * methods accordingly.</p>
314   *
315   * @param other the other {@link Binding}; may be {@code null} in which case a negative value will be returned
316   *
317   * @return an {@code int} representing a {@linkplain Comparable#compareTo(Object) comparison} of this {@link Binding}
318   * with the supplied {@link Binding}
319   *
320   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be, idempotent and deterministic.
321   *
322   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
323   *
324   * @see #hashCode()
325   *
326   * @see #equals(Object)
327   */
328  @Override // Comparable<B>
329  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
330  public int compareTo(final B other) {
331    if (other == null) {
332      return -1;
333    } else if (this.equals(other)) {
334      return 0;
335    } else {
336
337      int cmp = this.name().compareTo(other.name());
338      if (cmp != 0) {
339        return cmp;
340      }
341
342      Object myValue = this.value();
343      Object otherValue = other.value();
344      if (value == null) {
345        if (otherValue != null) {
346          return 1;
347        }
348      } else if (otherValue == null) {
349        return -1;
350      } else if (myValue instanceof Comparable) {
351        try {
352          cmp = ((Comparable<Object>)myValue).compareTo(otherValue);
353        } catch (final ClassCastException ohWell) {
354        }
355      }
356      if (cmp != 0) {
357        return cmp;
358      }
359
360      cmp = String.valueOf(this.value()).compareTo(String.valueOf(other.value())); // NOTE
361      if (cmp != 0) {
362        return cmp;
363      }
364
365      final SortedMap<String, Object> myAttributes = this.attributes();
366      final SortedMap<String, Object> otherAttributes = other.attributes();
367      cmp = Integer.compare(myAttributes.size(), otherAttributes.size());
368      if (cmp != 0) {
369        return cmp;
370      }
371      
372      final Iterator<Entry<String, Object>> myEntries = myAttributes.entrySet().iterator();
373      final Iterator<Entry<String, Object>> otherEntries = otherAttributes.entrySet().iterator();
374      while (myEntries.hasNext()) {
375        final Entry<String, ?> myEntry = myEntries.next();
376        final Entry<String, ?> otherEntry = otherEntries.next();
377        cmp = myEntry.getKey().compareTo(otherEntry.getKey());
378        if (cmp != 0) {
379          return cmp;
380        }
381
382        myValue = myEntry.getValue();
383        otherValue = otherEntry.getValue();
384        if (myValue == null) {
385          if (otherValue != null) {
386            return 1;
387          }
388        } else if (otherValue == null) {
389          return -1;
390        } else if (myValue instanceof Comparable) {
391          try {
392            cmp = ((Comparable<Object>)myValue).compareTo(otherValue);
393          } catch (final ClassCastException ohWell) {
394          }
395        }
396        if (cmp != 0) {
397          return cmp;
398        }
399
400        cmp = String.valueOf(myEntry.getValue()).compareTo(String.valueOf(otherEntry.getValue())); // NOTE
401        if (cmp != 0) {
402          return cmp;
403        }
404      }
405
406      assert cmp == 0 : "cmp: " + cmp; // really this means equals()/hashCode() were implemented badly
407      return cmp;
408    }
409  }
410
411  /**
412   * Returns {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to this {@link Binding}.
413   *
414   * <p>The supplied {@link Object} is considered to be equal to this {@link Binding} if and only if:</p>
415   *
416   * <ul>
417   *
418   * <li>Its {@linkplain #getClass() class} is identical to this {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain #getClass() class},
419   * and</li>
420   *
421   * <li>Its {@linkplain #name() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object) is equal to} this {@link Binding}'s {@linkplain
422   * #name() name}, and</li>
423   *
424   * <li>Its {@linkplain #value() value} {@linkplain Object#equals(Object) is equal to} this {@link Binding}'s
425   * {@linkplain #value() value}, and</li>
426   *
427   * <li>Its {@linkplain #attributes() attributes} {@linkplain Map#equals(Object) are equal to} this {@link Binding}'s
428   * {@linkplain #attributes() attributes}</li>
429   *
430   * </ul>
431   *
432   * <p>A subclass that overrides this method must also override the {@link #hashCode()} and {@link #compareTo(Binding)}
433   * methods accordingly.</p>
434   *
435   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null} in which case {@code false} will be returned
436   *
437   * @return {@code true} if the supplied {@link Object} is equal to this {@link Binding}
438   *
439   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be, idempotent and deterministic.
440   *
441   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
442   *
443   * @see #hashCode()
444   *
445   * @see #compareTo(Binding)
446   */
447  @Override // Object
448  public boolean equals(final Object other) {
449    if (this == other) {
450      return true;
451    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
452      final Binding<?, ?> her = (Binding<?, ?>)other;
453      return
454        Objects.equals(this.name(), her.name()) &&
455        Objects.equals(this.value(), her.value()) &&
456        Objects.equals(this.attributes(), her.attributes());
457    } else {
458      return false;
459    }
460  }
461
462  /**
463   * Returns a {@link String} representation of this {@link Binding}.
464   *
465   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately undefined and may change between versions of this
466   * class without prior notice.</p>
467   *
468   * @return a {@link String} representation of this {@link Binding}
469   *
470   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not, return {@code null}.
471   *
472   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be, idempotent and deterministic.
473   *
474   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
475   */
476  @Override // Object
477  public String toString() {
478    final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(this.name()).append('=').append(this.value());
479    final Map<?, ?> attributes = this.attributes();
480    if (!attributes.isEmpty()) {
481      sb.append(' ').append(attributes);
482    }
483    final Map<?, ?> info = this.info();
484    if (!info.isEmpty()) {
485      sb.append(" (").append(info).append(')');
486    }
487    return sb.toString();
488  }
489
490}
